snippet: Gov. Andrew M. Cuomo of New York promised to deliver a gift basket and a 2013 hockey puck marking his passage of an on-time budget to Gov. Jerry Brown of California, who countered with a promise of rice cakes.
lead_paragraph: Gov. Andrew M. Cuomo of New York promised to deliver a gift basket and a 2013 hockey puck marking his passage of an on-time budget to Gov. Jerry Brown of California, who countered with a promise of rice cakes.

headline.main: On the Line in Governors’ Stanley Cup Bets: Rice Cakes vs. Cupcakes
headline.print_headline: On the Line in Governors’ Stanley Cup Bets: Rice Cakes vs. Cupcakes
